name: Diclona Patch

indications.text: diclona patch indicated relief pain associated arthritis , backache , cramps , discomfort , neckache , soreness , sprains , strains . applied intact skin . sun avoidance indicated therapy .

contraindications.text: apply diclona patch intact skin cover painful area . clean dry affected area . apply product directly skin , 2 times daily . diclona patch worn longer 12 hours per application . clothing may worn area application . patches may cut smaller sizes scissors prior removal protective film . irritation burning sensation occurs application , wash product skin reapply irritation subsides . diclona patch used concomitantly products containing local anesthetic agents , amount absorbed formulations must considered .

warningsAndPrecautions: diclona patch available following : 15 patches : 3 patches per re-sealable pouch , 5 total pouches ndc 53225-1076-1 store 25°c ( 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15°-30°c ( 59°-86°f ) . [ usp controlled room temperature ] . manufactured : terrain pharmaceuticals reno , nv 89501 information , contact terrain pharmaceuticals : info @ terrainrx.com printed u.s.a .
adverseReactions: diclona patch contraindicated patients known history sensitivity local anesthetics amide type , component product . diclona patch contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity diclofenac sodium . diclona patch contraindicated patients setting coronary artery bypass graft ( cabg ) surgery .
indications_original: Diclona Patch is indicated for relief of pain associated with arthritis, backache, cramps, discomfort, neckache, soreness, sprains, strains. It should be applied only to intact skin. Sun avoidance is indicated during therapy.
contraindications_original:
Apply Diclona Patch to intact skin to cover the most painful area. Clean and dry the affected area. Apply product directly to your skin, up to 2 times daily. Diclona Patch should not be worn for longer than 12 hours per application. Clothing may be worn over the area of application. Patches may be cut into smaller sizes with scissors prior to removal of the protective film.
                  
                  If irritation or a burning sensation occurs during application, wash the product off your skin and do not reapply until the irritation subsides.
                  
                  When Diclona Patch is used concomitantly with other products containing local anesthetic agents, the amount absorbed from all formulations must be considered.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Diclona Patch is available as the following:
                  15 patches: 3 patches per re-sealable pouch, 5 total pouches
                  
                  
                  NDC 53225-1076-1
                  Store at 25°C (77°F); excursions permitted to 15°-30°C (59°-86°F). [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  
                  
                  Manufactured for:
                  Terrain Pharmaceuticals
                  Reno, NV 89501
                  
                  
                  For more information, contact Terrain Pharmaceuticals: 
  info@terrainrx.com
                  
                  
                  Printed in the U.S.A.
adverseReactions_original: Diclona Patch is contraindicated in patients with a known history of sensitivity to local anesthetics of the amide type, or to any other component of the product. Diclona Patch is contraindicated in patients with a known hypersensitivity to diclofenac sodium. Diclona Patch is contraindicated in patients in the setting of coronary artery bypass graft (CABG) surgery.
